name: git-last-commit-date
description: Reads the date of the last git commit and exports to environemnt variables.
author: Tom Curran

OutputVariables.name: GitLastCommitDate
OutputVariables.description: The date for the last git commit in ISO 8601 format

OutputVariables.name: GitLastCommitDateNumbers
OutputVariables.description: The date for the last git commit in format YYMMDDHHmm
